Adrenaline Boost
Need a production boost from some buildings? Pump your workers up with drugs! Your production in the dosed buildings will skyrocket since the workers will no longer need to sleep (or blink, strangely) until the drug wears off. This experimental drug has no lasting short-term effects, so it's probably fine!
Requirements:
Black Market is open

Radius: 2 tiles

Duration: 100s, 50s

Aluminum
Produced by:
Tile with Aluminum deposits and a Metal Mine
Processed by:
Electronics Factory consumes Aluminum , Carbon , and Silicon to produce Electronics

Auction a Tile
Start a tile auction. (If you auction your own tile, then you receive the money.)
Requirements:
Black Market is open 4 or more players

Radius: 1 tile

Basalt Platform
May only be built on a basalt lake
Consumes -0.2 Power to produce + 1 Iron, + 0.5 Silicon, and + 0.5 Uranium
Requirements:
Steel 10/10
Electronics 5/5
Hotkey:
 SHIFT + T

Bribe a Claim
The planetary UN rewards claims to companies that bring colonists to Mars. They reward claims to companies that give them big stacks of money under the table, too.
Requirements:
Black Market is open

Carbon
Produced by:
Tile with Carbon deposits and a Elemental Quarry Dry Ice Condenser produces Carbon
Processed by:
Chemicals Lab consumes Carbon and Fuel to produce Chemicals Electronics Factory consumes Carbon , Aluminum , and Silicon to produce Electronics

Carbon Scrubbing
Buildings which need Carbon collect it from the atmosphere.
Time: 80s
Requirements:
Chemicals 80/80
Researched Sound:

Chemicals
Produced by:
Chemical Refinery consumes Fuel and Carbon to produce Chemicals

Chemical Refinery
Consumes -0.5 Fuel , -0.5 Carbon and -0.2 Power to produce +0.5 Chemicals
Requirements:
Steel 40/40
Carbon 20/20
Hotkey:
 L

Circuit Overload
Overloaded buildings either produce no power or consume double power.
Requirements:
Black Market is open

Radius: spreads to adjacent tiles

Duration: 120s, 110s, 90s, 80s, etc...

Cold Fusion
Buildings are powered with Water.
Time: 40s
Requirements:
Chemicals 40/40
Researched Sound:

Cook the Books
"Cook the Books" is such a crass way to say "optimistic, rewards-based re-consideration of your current market valuation". The banking regulators will use your contribution to fraudulently improve your bond rating regardless of your prior credit history!
Requirements:
Black Market is open

Core Sample
Use illegal (but in no way unethical!) core sample technology to uncover hidden resources on a barren plot. We can't promise what you'll find, but we guarantee you'll find something.
Requirements:
Black Market is open

Radius: 1 tile

Solar Condenser (Mars)
Requires Dry Ice
Produces +0.5 Carbon and +0.5 Oxygen
Requirements:
Glass 5/5
Hotkey:
 O

Dynamite
What better way to say "let's agree to disagree" than turning a neighbor's most expensive building into a smoking ruin. Sure, they'll probably repair it eventually, but the look on their face was worth it.
Requirements:
Black Market is open

EMP
An Electromagnetic Pulse is a harsh bummer to all electronic equipment, causing buildings to malfunction for a while and people to look up from their computers for once.
Requirements:
Black Market is open

Radius: 4 tiles

Duration: 100s, 50s, 33s, 25s

Electrolysis Reactor
Consumes -1 Water and -0.3 Power to produce +0.25 Oxygen and +0.5 Fuel
Requirements:
Aluminum 10/10
Steel 40/40
Hotkey:
 R

Electronics
Produced by:
Electronics Factory consumes Aluminum , Carbon , and Silicon to produce Electronics

Electronics Factory
Consumes -0.25 Aluminum , -0.5 Carbon , -0.25 Silicon and -0.2 Power to produce +0.25 Electronics
Requirements:
Steel 40/40
Aluminum 20/20
Hotkey:
 E

Elemental Quarry
Requires Carbon deposit or Silicon deposit
Consumes -0.1 Power to produce +0.25-2.0 Carbon or Silicon
Hotkey:
 Q
